text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ

translation.en.sahih: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children
translation.id.indonesian: sedang mereka saling memandang. Orang kafir ingin kalau sekiranya dia dapat menebus (dirinya) dari azab hari itu dengan anak-anaknya,
